item.title: Experience
item.description: Work PlayPass NV Ruby / Elixir / React Full Stack Developer Nov 2013 - Present PlayPass is a startup (scaling up) that develops software for festival organizers and large venues. It provides solutions for Access Control / Accreditation & Cashless Payments. I am mainly responsible for the architecture and development of the different solutions, with a main focus on the Access control and Accreditation. As a lead developer, I coach other developers and sketched out the future vision of the software.

item.title: Hello :wave:,
item.description: My name is Jan Stevens. I'm a full stack developer based in Antwerp. I'm fascinated by technology and finding solutions for complex problems. I've build software in Rails / Ruby / Postgres / GraphQL / Elixir & React. I'm a jack of all trades that easily picks up new technology and successfully applies it in production. From building full stack applications to cross compiling Android for ARM Point of Sales devices.
